title: Features for Foodie Groups
subtitle: Discover how matbakh revolutionizes the restaurant experience with friends.

search.title: Smart Restaurant Search
search.description: Find restaurants based on location, cuisine, allergies and personal preferences. Maximum 6 perfect matches.

voting.title: Group Voting
voting.description: Invite friends to vote without registration. Democratic decision making for restaurant selection.

booking.title: Seamless Reservations
booking.description: Direct table booking via Google integration after group decision is made.

weeklyMenu.title: Personal Weekly Menu
weeklyMenu.description: AI-generated weekly plans based on nutrition goals, preferences and restaurant visits.

shoppingList.title: Smart Shopping Lists
shoppingList.description: Automatic shopping lists based on recipes and weekly plans with price estimates.

calendarManagement.title: Calendar Integration
calendarManagement.description: Sync with personal calendar for optimal meal planning and restaurant appointments.

mealAdjustment.title: Customizable Meals
mealAdjustment.description: Flexible adjustment of portions, ingredients and nutrition values based on individual needs.
